result.description: D74 3 MATILDE National Workshops dissemination and exploitation of MATILDE results in particular for the selfassessment tools Task 63 and the best practices at local level Task 54 Around 3040 people are expected to participate in each workshop National workshops will target practitioners and organisations in migration related fields social policies and territorial planning They are implemented by ZAR GCU and FAU in Subtask 741
